name: Appetizer
description: A small dish served before the main course to stimulate the appetite.

name: Salad
description: A dish consisting of a mixture of small pieces of food, usually vegetables or fruit, sometimes with a dressing.

name: Main Course
description: The main dish of a meal.

name: Dessert
description: A sweet course typically eaten at the end of a meal.

name: Beverage
description: A drink, especially one other than water.

name: Soup
description: A liquid dish, typically made by boiling meat, fish, or vegetables, etc., in stock or water.

name: Sandwich
description: A food typically consisting of vegetables, sliced cheese or meat, placed on or between slices of bread.

name: Pizza
description: A dish of Italian origin, consisting of a flat, round base of dough baked with a topping of tomatoes and cheese.

name: Pasta
description: A dish originally from Italy consisting of dough made from durum wheat and water, extruded or stamped into various shapes, and typically cooked in boiling water.

name: Sushi
description: A Japanese dish consisting of small balls or rolls of vinegar-flavored cold cooked rice served with a garnish of raw fish, vegetables, or egg.
